# Interface TTSOutputInterface

Interface representing TTS output data.

interface TTSOutputInterface {  
audio: [AudioChunkInterface](./common_data_types_common.AudioChunkInterface);  
phonemes: string[];  
text: string;  
timestamps: number[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

audio phonemes text timestamps

## Properties

### audio

audio: [AudioChunkInterface](./common_data_types_common.AudioChunkInterface)

Audio data of the TTS output

### phonemes

phonemes: string[]

Phonemes of the TTS output

### text

text: string

Text content of the TTS output

### timestamps

timestamps: number[]

Timestamps of the TTS output
